name: Cold Iron (itch)
description:
Cold Iron is a short, text-based horror game inspired by European witch folklore by Masha Lepire and Eugene Fasano.

Close the sidebar, put on headphones, and make the game full screen for a more immersive experience.

This game was supported by our wonderful patrons Shaded Areas Entertainment, Lauren Careccia, Masha Vasilchikova, Jon Bash, Brandon Nelson, Kevin Vitz-Wong, and Ivan Lychkov.

Support our games on Patreon. ❤️
